  • Constructor Details

    • Ability

      public Ability​(java.lang.String imageURL, Board board, float x, float y, Entity entity, java.lang.String name, float abilityLength)
      Constructor for the abstract class of Abilities, all of them should be extended by this.
      Parameters:
      imageURL - URL of the image for the ability
      board - Instance of the gameboard
      x - X position of the ability
      y - Y position of the ability
      entity - Entity for the ability to take affect on (Usually the player)
      name - Name of the ability
      abilityLength - Length of time the ability should take affect for

  • Method Details

    • Draw

      public void Draw​(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch)
      Draws the entity on the board, either with an animation or an image.
      Parameters:
      batch - Spritebatch which displays all of the stuff in the driver
